# What is the R package **mixVarClust**

In this document, I show
* how to install the package an load it
* how and use it small study on a financial dataset
* a comparison with Rmixmod. 

## How to install **mixVarClust**
Download the package at , save it in your favorite folder. Install it by running the code below :
```{r}
#install.packages(path_to_file, repos = NULL, type="source")
```
## 
```{r setup}
#load the package
library(mixVarClust)
# functions present in the package
help(package = mixVarClust)
```
